article_title: 5 Lessons For Entrepreneurs From Obamacare's Failed Launch

article_metadata.description: Recent polls show that a majority of Americans would prefer to delay or terminate implementation of the The Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (ACA), AKA Obamacare. While some citizens certainly oppose the law for ideological or macro-economic reasons, it is fascinating that many people who both originally supported the [...]
